value.original: A unique and often automatically generated identifier for a sales order.

row.value: Identificador único, a menudo generado automáticamente, para un pedido de venta.

value.original: Unique identifier and a reference to a Sales Order originating from the document sequence defined for this document type.

row.value: Es el identificador único del pedido de venta. Está formado por el número de documento, la fecha de pedido y el importe del pedido.

value.original: Date of the payment event. It is used in the posting record of the Payment to the general ledger as accounting date. Defaulted to the current date, it can always be changed.

row.value: Date of the payment event. It is used in the posting record of the Payment to the general ledger as accounting date. Defaulted to the current date, it can always be changed.

value.original: Date of the payment event. It is used in the posting record of the Payment to the general ledger as accounting date. Defaulted to the current date, it can always be changed.

row.value: Date of the payment event. It is used in the posting record of the Payment to the general ledger as accounting date. Defaulted to the current date, it can always be changed.
